collection.title: White Noise Machines for Babies
collection.body_html: Help your baby fall asleep and stay asleep by mimicking the soothing sounds of the womb. Our baby sound machines are a must-have for any nursery.

Create a calm, soothing environment anywhere with the Aetherzx Portable White Noise Night Light USB Cup. Combining soft night lighting with relaxing white noise, this multifunctional sleep aid is perfect for bedrooms, nurseries, offices, or travel. Its compact, cup-shaped design makes it portable, stylish, and easy to use.

products.title: Again White Noise Night Light USB Sleep Aid with Music Timer & Smart Home Features for Sleep & Rest
products.body_html:
Again White Noise Night Light USB Sleep Aid with Music Timer & Smart Home Features for Sleep & Rest

Create a serene and relaxing sleep environment with the Again White Noise Night Light, designed to combine soothing music, white noise, and intelligent lighting for the ultimate bedtime experience. Perfect for adults, children, or babies, this device promotes deep, restorative sleep while adding a touch of smart home convenience.

Equipped with USB power and smart timing functions, it’s easy to use anywhere in your home. Choose from a variety of lighting options and calming sounds to customize your sleep atmosphere for relaxation, meditation, or bedtime routines.

Key Features:

  • Lighting Options: 8 types of lights including 5 levels of warm white light and 3 colorful light modes.

  • Soothing Sounds: 26 sound options including white noise, fan sounds, cradle music, and natural sounds.

  • Smart Timer Function: Choose from 30, 60, or 90 minutes for automatic shut-off.

  • Intelligent Design: Functional memory and boot memory for ease of use.

  • Convenient Controls: Buttons and voice prompts for nighttime recognition and operation.

  • Long-Lasting Battery: 1000 mAh rechargeable battery provides up to 5 hours of continuous use.

  • USB Charging: Comes with 1.5m long USB cable for flexible placement.

Specifications:

  • Power Type: USB

  • Functions: Timing, music, white noise

  • Color: White

Why You’ll Love It:

✔ 26 soothing sounds for relaxation and better sleep
✔ 8 lighting modes for customizable bedtime ambiance
✔ Smart timer for convenience and energy saving
✔ Portable USB design for use anywhere
✔ Ideal for adults, children, and babies

Package Contents:

  • 1 × White Noise Machine

Designed to promote relaxation and better sleep, this compact device combines gentle night lighting with built-in white noise sounds to help reduce anxiety, mask background noise, and ease you into peaceful rest.

Its USB rechargeable design makes it energy-efficient and portable, perfect for bedrooms, nurseries, offices, or travel. Simple mechanical controls and a timed auto-shutdown function add convenience, while the minimalist white finish blends seamlessly into any space.

products.title: Lulla Multi-Scene Music Sleep Instrument Baby Crying Comforter with White Noise for Better Sleep & Relaxation
products.body_html:
Lulla Multi-Scene Music Sleep Instrument Baby Crying Comforter with White Noise for Better Sleep & Relaxation

Soothe your baby and create the perfect sleep environment with the Lulla Music Sleep Instrument, designed to calm crying, reduce restlessness, and help both babies and adults fall asleep peacefully. This versatile device combines 6 white noise scenes with adjustable volume and timer functions, making it the ideal companion for bedtime or naps.

Choose from light music, raindrops, forest bird song, thunderstorm weather, ocean waves, and classic white noise to create a calming atmosphere. The auto-timer lets you set 15, 30, or 45 minutes for convenience, while the USB rechargeable/battery-powered design ensures portability for travel and on-the-go use.

Lightweight, compact, and easy to carry, the Lulla Sleep Instrument brings comfort and relaxation anywhere you go.

Key Features:

  • 6 soothing sound scenes: light music, raindrops, bird songs, thunderstorms, ocean waves & white noise

  • Automatic timer options: 15, 30, or 45 minutes

  • Adjustable volume controls

  • Rechargeable via USB or battery-powered

  • Portable, lightweight design – perfect for home or travel

Specifications:

  • Type: Music Sleep Instrument

  • Power Supply: Rechargeable, USB, battery

  • Functions: Music, timing, portable white noise

  • Application: Baby crying comforter & adult sleep aid

Why You’ll Love It:

  • Calms crying babies and helps them sleep faster

  • Provides a peaceful environment for deep rest

  • Perfect for travel, nursery, or home

  • Simple, lightweight, and easy to use

  • Suitable for both babies and adults

Package Contents:
1 × Lulla Multi-Scene Music Sleep Instrument
1 × Charging Cable
1 × User Manual

products.title: Pebbleo White Portable Noise Machine Baby Sleep Device for Sleeping & Relaxation
products.body_html:
Pebbleo White Portable Noise Machine Baby Sleep Device for Sleeping & Relaxation

Help your baby—or yourself—enjoy peaceful, uninterrupted sleep with the Pebbleo White Noise Machine. Featuring 9 soothing sound options including rain, sea waves, thunder, wind, running water, light music, guqin, sky sound, and prenatal music, this device creates a calm environment for relaxation.

Designed with automatic timing functions (15, 30, 60 minutes) and a volume control knob, Pebbleo allows precise customization to suit your needs. Its lightweight, portable design makes it perfect for home, office, travel, or nursery use. The high-fidelity music chip ensures pure, clear sound, while the soft indicator light creates a cozy atmosphere.

Key Features:

  • 9 Soothing Sounds: Rain, sea, thunder, wind, running water, light music, guqin, sky sound, prenatal music

  • Automatic Timer: Choose 15, 30, or 60 minutes with automatic shut-off

  • Portable & Lightweight: Ideal for home, travel, office, daycare, or dorms

  • High-Fidelity Sound: Ensures pure, calming audio for relaxation

  • Soft Indicator Light: Adds to a comfortable sleep environment

  • Long-Lasting Battery: Built-in high-energy lithium battery for extended use

Specifications:

  • Power: 4-AA Battery

  • Voltage: 5VDC 300mA

  • Rated Power: 1.5W

  • Box Size: 16.5 × 16 × 6.3 cm

  • Standards: European ROHS

Why You’ll Love It:

✔ Helps babies and adults fall asleep faster
✔ Blocks distractions with soothing white noise
✔ Adjustable timer for customized sleep sessions
✔ Portable for use anywhere—home, travel, or office
✔ Creates a calm and relaxing atmosphere

Package Contents:

  • 1 × Pebbleo White Noise Machine (Gray Card Box Packaging)

  • 1 × USB Cable

products.title: Serentm White Noise Baby Sleep Aid Sound Machine with Timer for Baby Sleep & Relaxation
products.body_html:
Serentm White Noise Baby Sleep Aid Sound Machine with Timer for Baby Sleep & Relaxation.

Ensure your baby sleeps peacefully with the Serentm White Noise Sound Machine, designed to create a calming environment for infants. With 20 built-in soothing sounds, this versatile device helps babies drift off faster and stay asleep longer. It also features a timer function, night light, and ambient atmosphere lighting, making it perfect for nurseries or travel.

The machine supports earphone listening and can be powered via AC adapter or a rechargeable 18650 battery, providing flexibility for home use or on-the-go. Its compact design ensures it fits easily on nightstands or cribs, giving your baby a restful, distraction-free sleep environment.

Key Features:

  • 20 Soothing Sounds: Includes white noise, nature sounds, lullabies, and more.

  • Timer Function: Adjustable for 20–60 minutes of continuous play.

  • Night Light & Ambient Light: Soft illumination for bedtime comfort.

  • Flexible Power Options: AC adapter or rechargeable 18650 lithium battery.

  • Earphone Listening: Private listening option for personalized use.

  • Compact & Portable: Perfect for nursery, bedroom, or travel.

Specifications:

  • Working Voltage: 3.7V (supports 18650 rechargeable lithium battery)

  • Dynamic Current: No light <200 mA, Light <450 mA

  • Quiescent Current: 20 uA

  • Product Size: Ф150 × 32.5 mm (excluding speaker net)

  • Speaker: 75 mm diameter, 4Ω 3W

  • Power Supply: AC 100–240V, 50/60Hz input; DC 5V, 1A output

Why You’ll Love It:

✔ Helps babies fall asleep faster and sleep longer
✔ 20 soothing sounds for a relaxing environment
✔ Adjustable timer and night light for convenience
✔ Flexible power options for home or travel
✔ Compact, safe, and baby-friendly design

Package Contents:

  • 1 × Serentm White Noise Sound Machine

products.title: Swaddlezx Baby White Noise Bluetooth Speaker for Relaxation & Deep Sleep
products.body_html:
Swaddlezx Baby White Noise Bluetooth Speaker for Relaxation & Deep Sleep

Ensure peaceful nights with the Swaddlezx Baby White Noise Bluetooth Speaker, a versatile sleep aid designed for infants, toddlers, and adults. Preloaded with soothing white noise and lullabies, this portable Bluetooth speaker creates a calming environment at home, during travel, or in the nursery.

Key Benefits:

  • Preloaded white noise and lullabies to help babies sleep faster

  • Bluetooth connectivity to play music, audiobooks, or custom sounds

  • Lightweight, portable, and USB rechargeable for on-the-go use

  • Adjustable volume for safe and comfortable listening

  • Suitable for adults too – meditation, yoga, office relaxation

  • Compact and nursery-friendly design

Specifications:

  • Brand: Swaddlezx

  • Material: ABS Plastic + Electronics

  • Power: USB Rechargeable Battery

  • Functions: White Noise, Lullabies, Bluetooth Music Playback

  • Volume: Adjustable

  • Size: Compact and portable

  • Color: White

  • Suitable For: Babies, Toddlers, Adults, Travel, Nursery

Why You’ll Love It:

  • Multifunctional design – soothes infants and adults alike

  • Creates a calm and restful sleep environment

  • Perfect for travel, nursery, or home use

  • Rechargeable battery ensures long-lasting use without interruption

  • Safe, gentle, and portable – ideal for families on the go

Package Contents:

  • 1 x Swaddlezx Baby White Noise Bluetooth Speaker

  • 1 x USB Charging Cable

  • 1 x User Manual

products.title: Three Sheep White Noise Sleep Device USB Baby Music Box for Newborn & Infant Sleep
products.body_html:
Three Sheep White Noise Sleep Device USB Baby Music Box for Newborn & Infant Sleep

Help your baby drift off peacefully with the Three Sheep White Noise Sleep Device, designed to comfort infants and promote faster, deeper sleep. This innovative music box emits soothing white noise and gentle lullabies, creating a calm environment that eases babies into rest.

With USB power and a compact, modern design, it’s perfect for nurseries, bedside tables, or travel. Suitable for newborns up to 3 years old, this device is a reliable sleep companion for infants and toddlers alike.

Key Features:

  • Soothing White Noise & Music: Blocks distractions and calms babies for restful sleep.

  • Fast Sleep Instrument: Helps infants fall asleep quickly and stay asleep longer.

  • USB Powered: Easy to use anywhere, no batteries required.

  • Safe & Infant-Friendly: Gentle sounds designed specifically for newborns and toddlers.

  • Compact Design: Fits perfectly in nurseries or bedside areas.

Specifications:

  • Power Mode: USB

  • Function: Music function / white noise

  • Colors: K1 Orange, S7 White

  • Applicable Age: 0–3 years old

Why You’ll Love It:

✔ Helps newborns and infants sleep better
✔ Promotes calm and peaceful bedtime routines
✔ USB powered and easy to use
✔ Compact and portable for home or travel
✔ Gentle white noise and lullabies for infant comfort

Package Contents:

  • 1 × Three Sheep White Noise Sleep Device

products.title: Three Sheep White Noise Sleep Instrument for Baby Soothing & Comfort Sleeping
products.body_html:
Three Sheep White Noise Sleep Instrument for Baby Soothing & Comfort Sleeping

Ensure your baby sleeps soundly with the Three Sheep White Noise Sleep Instrument, designed for newborns and infants from 0 months onward. This portable, compact device produces 6 soothing sound sources, including fetal heartbeats, white noise, and gentle lullabies, helping your little one relax and sleep peacefully.

Its built-in 1800mAh battery allows over 10 hours of continuous play with a fast charging time of under 3 hours. Lightweight and easy to place in nurseries, cribs, or even take on the go, it is perfect for home, travel, or daycare use.

Key Features:

  • 6 Soothing Sound Sources: Fetal heartbeat, white noise, and gentle lullabies to comfort and relax babies.

  • Long Battery Life: 1800mAh battery provides ≥10 hours continuous play, ≥30 days standby.

  • Portable Design: Compact and lightweight, perfect for nurseries, cribs, or travel.

  • Fast Recharge: Fully charges in ≤3 hours via USB cable.

  • High-Quality Sound: φ40mm speaker with 3W maximum output for clear, soothing audio.

Specifications:

  • Product Name: Baby Comforting & Sleeping Device

  • Material: ABS plastic

  • Dimensions: 77 × 48.3 × 98mm

  • Color: Orange and White

  • Battery Capacity: 1800mAh

  • Charging Time: ≤3 hours

  • Continuous Play Time: ≥10 hours

  • Standby Time: ≥30 days

  • Speaker: φ40mm, 8Ω2

  • Accessories: 1.2m USB cable

  • Applicable Age: 0 months +

Why You’ll Love It:

✔ Soothes newborns and infants with calming sounds
✔ Portable and compact for home or travel
✔ Long-lasting battery ensures uninterrupted sleep
✔ Fetal heartbeat sound for comfort and familiarity
✔ Easy to charge and use

Package Contents:

  • 1 × Three Sheep White Noise Baby Sleep Instrument

  • 1 × 1.2m USB Cable

products.title: Verba Baby Soothing Bed Bell White Noise Sleep Aid with Luminous Recording for Comforting & Calming
products.body_html:
Verba Baby Soothing Bed Bell White Noise Sleep Aid with Luminous Recording for Comforting & Calming

Soothe your little one into sweet dreams with the Verba Baby Soothing Bed Bell, a multifunctional sleep aid designed to create a calm bedtime environment. Featuring gentle white noise, music, and a luminous recording function, this device not only helps your baby relax but also allows parents to record comforting messages for personalised sleep support.

Made from safe, durable plastic materials, this baby bed bell encourages emotional development, vision, hearing, and parent-child bonding. Its interactive features make it the perfect nursery companion to help babies feel secure, calm, and loved.

Key Features:

  • White Noise & Music: Blocks disruptive sounds for better sleep.

  • Luminous Recording Function: Record personal messages or lullabies.

  • Interactive Learning: Supports emotion, hearing, vision, and sensory training.

  • Safe & Durable: Made from child-safe plastic with smooth edges.

  • Parent-Child Communication: Strengthens bonding with soothing sounds.

Specifications:

  • Material: Plastic

  • Function: White noise, music, luminous recording

  • Training Abilities: Emotion, vision, hearing, senses, interactive play, communication

  • Packaging: Window box

  • Import: Domestic

Why You’ll Love It:

✔ Combines sleep aid with personalised recordings
✔ Gentle white noise helps babies sleep soundly
✔ Promotes sensory development and bonding
✔ Lightweight and safe for nursery use
✔ Great for bedtime routines and nap times

Package Contents:

  • 1 × Baby Soothing Bed Bell White Noise Sounder
